description: This is a source component file for a front-end application built using LightningJS. It defines a SearchBar component that handles searching with preset samples, user input via left/right arrow keys, and commits via Enter. It interacts with a global state store and external actions.

classes.name: SearchBar
classes.description: A LightningJS component providing a search UI with sample cycling and state synchronization.

methods.name: commit
methods.description: Sets the query in the global store to the current local query value.

methods.name: left
methods.description: Cycles to the previous sample and updates the query.

methods.name: right
methods.description: Cycles to the next sample and updates the query.

methods.name: enter
methods.description: Triggers the commit method to update the global query.

methods.name: back
methods.description: Delegates focus back to the parent component if available.
